channel.title: Posts on RAW-TECH
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on RAW-TECH

item.title: Building a Apache Launchpad for My Homelab
item.description: Building a Dockerised Apache Launchpad for My Homelab

item.title: Windows 11 Readiness Reporting via PowerShell + Active Directory
item.description: How to implement a domain-wide Windows 11 readiness audit using PowerShell and Active Directory to track compatibility across all machines.

item.title: Yr Wyddfa via Watkin Path. A Rain-Soaked Adventure
item.description: A rugged climb through mist and rain, chasing waterfalls and quiet triumphs on Snowdon’s wildest trail.

item.title: Building RAW-TECH: From Hand-Coded HTML to Hugo
item.description: building and rebuilding my personal website—from pure HTML/CSS to Hugo with PaperMod.

item.title: My Pandemic in Blender
item.description: How Blender helped me find creative focus in a time of isolation, one render at a time.

item.title: Rebuilding Civilisation: Dr. Stone as a Blueprint for Humanity
item.description: A look at how Dr. Stone fast-tracks the history of human progress, rebuilding technology from the ground up in a way that’s both scientifically grounded and surprisingly believable.

item.title: Passive Consumerism: How Entertainment Is Quietly Reshaping Civilization
item.description: A closer look at how passive entertainment habits, fueled by streaming giants and formulaic franchises are subtly reshaping human behavior and our broader cultural direction.

item.title: The Homelab Project
item.description: A technical journey through building a Plex-focused homelab from the ground up, covering architecture, automation, monitoring, and the philosophy behind it all.

item.title: Weather Tracker: A Real-Time Weather App
item.description: A modern weather web app using OpenWeather API and Vercel serverless functions.

item.title: My Favorite Games: Ranked and Scored
item.description: A hand-curated list of my favorite games, ranked by personal metrics like narrative, exploration, and replayability.

item.title: A Journey Through Landscape Photography
item.description: Each frame is a memory, a story, a small piece of stillness.

item.title: Film Affinity: Building a Film Critique Generator
item.description: A Python-powered app that scrapes Letterboxd ratings and generates AI-based film critiques with GPT-3.5.

item.title: Exchange Online: Tagging External Emails with Powershell
item.description: A simple PowerShell-based approach to visibly tagging external emails in Exchange Online.
